backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, access control, and detailed types for multiple pool match modes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific APA 9‑ball rack‑scoring feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing UI components and pages for all game modes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack router, global theme, auth gate, layout, and all route definitions.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Renders a styled button for an APA ball with color‑coded states and scoring metadata.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball states and helpers for scoring 9-ball racks, including point values and total calculations.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: APA rack scoring UI with inning flow, ball state tracking, and auto-dead logic when the 9‑ball is pocketed.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Renders a detailed APA match results summary showing winner, match-point breakdown, and per-player stats including PPI and innings.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: React hook managing APA inning flow, tracking active player, inning counts, and ball-scoring state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper component that blocks access until Internet Identity login completes, showing loading or login UI as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with error recovery and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog shown after first login to capture and save a user's display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout with header, footer, router outlet, login controls, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Provides a confirmation dialog to delete a match and redirect or notify when done.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog that confirms ending and saving a match session, showing loading state during save.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Clickable card summarizing a match with mode-specific labels, date/time, players, and score summary.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card UI for selecting a gameplay mode, showing icon, description, and a button to start a new game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, matches, and accepting-gifts data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Implements game state helpers for adjusting object ball counts and updating set and attempt results.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA 9-ball skill levels and functions for mapping skill levels to required points and formatting values.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Provides match point conversion charts for APA 9‑ball based on loser points and skill level.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring utilities, validation, PPI calculation, and stat aggregation for players.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Constructs APA 9-ball match records, generating IDs, timestamps, and player stats based on scoring and rack data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages gameplay state for the Accepting Gifts drill, handling attempts, set progression, and session persistence.
Shows rules and instructions for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Start page for the Accepting Gifts drill, allowing player setup and baseline configuration.
Runs APA 9-ball practice games, updates scoring per rack, and detects match completion.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Form page to start an APA 9‑ball practice match, collecting player names, skill levels, notes, and initializing game state in session storage.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed information for a selected match, including players, mode-specific data, and deletion options.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows a filterable list of past matches with tabs by mode and links to match summaries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home screen with navigation cards for practice modes and history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages the Straight Shot drill session, tracking strokes and events, saving results, and allowing match completion.
Static panel explaining rules and scoring for the Straight Shot Strokes Drill.
Start page for the Straight Shot drill, collecting player info, showing moving average stats, and initializing game state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s current project state, architecture notes, APA 9‑ball scoring rules, practice modes, and known issues for development tracking.
